com.itextpdf.text.pdf.codec
Class CCITTG4Encoder

java.lang.Object
  com.itextpdf.text.pdf.codec.CCITTG4Encoder

public class CCITTG4Encoder
extends Object

Encodes data in the CCITT G4 FAX format.
